info.title: Pipedrive
info.description: Pipedrive is a CRM & pipeline management tool that helps you focus on actions that matter.

get.summary: When a new activity is added
get.description: Triggers when a new activity is added to the authorized account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a new activity.

post.description: This operation creates a new deal for the authorized account.

get.description: This operation retrieves all details of an existing deal, given its id.

put.description: This operation is used to update the stage associated with a deal, given its id.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new activity for the authorized account.

user_id.description: Id of the user whom the activity will be assigned to.

org_id.description: ID of the organization the activity will be associated with.

active.description: True if the deal is active.

deleted.description: True if the deal has been deleted.

files_count.description: Number of files associated with the deal.

participants_count.description: Number of participants associated with the deal.

next_activity_subject.description: Subject of next activity associated with the deal.
